Default content types¶

This is a list of content types that should be defined / handled in order to test / support a wide range of needed features.

Page¶

Standard pages, to be placed in menus etc.

Fields:

  • Title
  • Body

Article¶

For blog posts, etc.

Fields:

  • Title
  • Body
  • Picture (it’s nice to have a small picture for each blog post)

Photo¶

Represents a single photo. Photos can then be grouped in galleries.

Fields:

  • Photo
  • Title
  • Description

Table Of Contents

  • Default content types

    • Article
    • Photo
